lead_paragraph: A bill moving forward in Congress would block the IRS from taxing most medals or other prizes awarded to U.S. Olympians.

headline.main: Congress Moves to Block 'Victory Tax' on Olympic Athletes
headline.print_headline: Congress Moves to Block 'Victory Tax' on Olympic Athletes

snippet: A bill moving forward in Congress would block the IRS from taxing most medals or other prizes awarded to U.S. Olympians....
